description:
An example implementation of a simple ecommerce store. 
All data is fetched dynamically from fakestorehttps://fakestoreapi.com/ and demonstrates how  
dynamic functionality can be added be the usage of blocks. The available categories are fetched from the api.
Then when a user clicks in a category button a request is made to get the products and display them in a grid.
A simple website that makes an api request to gifi and displays the gifs returned
